ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.interfaces
Interface RendererInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractRenderer, GL2DRenderer, GLES11Renderer, GLES20Renderer
public interface RendererInterface

This interface declares the functionality of a render context, or a "renderer". This is what's used to draw anything on the screen. This extends the Renderer interface from the class GLSurfaceView from the Android framework, so that the callback methods will work as advertised.
